results.title: Independent living centre [Turkish Version]
results.brief_description: Outlines the highly specialised and unique services of the Independent Living Centre in Victoria which aims to assist people with disabilities to enhance their independence and quality of life by providing demonstrations, advice and information on a comprehensive range of aids and equipment for daily living. Narrated in Turkish.

results.title: Independent company
results.creator_credit: John Tatoulis, Colin South and Media World
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Warriors”.
The story of Sparrow Force, the Australian 2/2 Independent Company, a specially trained troop of Australian soldiers sent to join Dutch forces in Timor in 1941, to defend Northern Australia against the Japanese advance. The program uses interviews with surviving Company members, as well as their Japanese opponents, mixed with re-enactments of their experiences. The interviews reveal that without the selfless assistance of the Timorese, the Australian troops would not have survived. The program also features footage shot by Academy Award winning Australian news cameraman, Damien Parer, who was killed in action in New Guinea.
results.creator_credit_for_label: John Tatoulis, Colin South and Media World

results.title: Independence Day USA
results.creator_credit: John G. Fuller and United States Information Agency
results.brief_description: Describes the various ways in which individual Americans celebrate their Independence Day, July 4th. They honour the heroes responsible for the Declaration of Independence and the national ideals of human rights embodied in it.
results.creator_credit_for_label: John G. Fuller and United States Information Agency

results.title: Independence day (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Roland Emmerich, Dean Devlin and Centropolis Entertainment
results.brief_description: One of the biggest box office hits of all time, this movie delivers the ultimate encounter when aliens launch an invasion against the human race. The spectacle begins when massive spaceships appear. Wonder turns to terror as the ships blast destructive beams of fire down on cities all over the planet. Now the world’s only hope lies with determined survivors, uniting for one last strike against the invaders - before it’s the end of mankind. Cast includes Will Smith, Bill Pullman, Jeff Goldblum and Mary McDonnell.

results.title: Independence Day
results.brief_description: On July 2, a giant alien mothership enters orbit around Earth and deploys several dozen saucer-shaped ‘destroyer’ spacecraft that quickly lay waste to major cities around the planet.

constellations_other.name: Hack the planet
constellations_other.description: How do you represent something that's... kinda boring to look at, like hacking, when you're operating in a visual medium like film, TV and videogames?

results.description: On July 2, a giant alien mothership enters orbit around Earth and deploys several dozen saucer-shaped ‘destroyer’ spacecraft that quickly lay waste to major cities around the planet. On July 3, the United States conducts a coordinated counterattack that fails. On July 4, a plan is devised to gain access to the interior of the alien mothership in space, in order to plant a nuclear missile.
description_for_label: On July 2, a giant alien mothership enters orbit around Earth and deploys several dozen saucer-shaped ‘destroyer’ spacecraft that quickly lay waste to major cities around the planet. On July 4, a plan is devised to gain access to the interior of the alien mothership in space, in order to plant a nuclear missile.
